channel.title: The Willpower Instinct (9/10) :: Linux Reader
channel.description: Summary and Highlights “I will” power challenge: Something that you would like to do more of, or stop putting off, because you know that doing it will improve the quality of your life? “I won’t” power challenge: What is the “stickiest” habit in your life? What would you like to give up or do less of because it’s undermining your health, happiness, or success?•
